sourcesContent:
Teams

Team 1

  • {{ user.username }} - {{ user.status }}

Team 2

  • {{ user.username }} - {{ user.status }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { UserService } from '../user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-selection', templateUrl: './selection.component.html', styleUrls: ['./selection.component.css'] }) export class SelectionComponent { users1: any[]; users2: any[]; errorMessage: string; constructor(private userService: UserService) {} ngOnInit() { this.userService.getUsersWithTeamAndStatus().subscribe( users => { this.users1 = users.filter(user => user.team === '1'); this.users2 = users.filter(user => user.team === '2'); }, error => { console.error(error); this.errorMessage = error; } ); } }
